criteria: Accuracy in calculating measures of center (mean, median) and spread (IQR, standard deviation) for different data sets.
Appropriateness of statistical measures used based on the shape of the data distribution.
Quality of interpretation and comparison of center and spread between two or more data sets.
Clarity and accuracy of representation of data sets.
descriptions: No attempt or calculations are completely incorrect.
Calculations are attempted but contain significant errors, demonstrating a lack of understanding of basic statistical measures.
Calculations contain some errors. The student demonstrates partial understanding of statistical measures.
Calculations are mostly correct with minor errors. Demonstrates a general understanding of statistical measures.
Calculations are accurate. Demonstrates a solid understanding of statistical measures.
Calculations are entirely accurate and precise, demonstrating mastery of statistical measures.
Does not use appropriate statistics. Little to no recognition of data distribution shapes.
Attempts to use appropriate statistics, but demonstrates a misunderstanding of when to apply each measure based on data distribution.
Sometimes uses appropriate statistics, but inconsistently. Shows some awareness of data distribution shapes.
Mostly uses appropriate statistics, with few errors. Demonstrates a good understanding of data distribution shapes.
Consistently uses appropriate statistics tailored to the shape of the data distribution. Demonstrates a strong understanding of data distribution shapes.
Expertly selects and justifies the use of statistical measures, demonstrating a deep understanding of data distribution and its impact on statistical analysis.
No attempt to interpret or compare data sets.
Attempts to interpret or compare data sets, but provides inaccurate or irrelevant statements.
Provides basic interpretations or comparisons but lacks depth or insight.
Provides reasonable interpretations and comparisons of data sets, highlighting some key differences or similarities.
Provides insightful interpretations and comparisons of data sets, clearly articulating differences or similarities and their significance.
Offers comprehensive and nuanced interpretations and comparisons, drawing insightful conclusions and implications from the data.
Data is not represented, or representation is completely unclear and inaccurate.
Representation of data is attempted but is largely unclear, inaccurate, or incomplete.
Data representation has some inaccuracies or missing elements.
Data representation is mostly clear and accurate with minor omissions.
Data representation is clear, accurate, and complete.
Data representation is exceptionally clear, accurate, visually appealing, and effectively highlights key features of the data sets.
